posts.title: Chalkboard Balloons
posts.content: Add a special touch to any celebration by personalizing the decor using these chalkboard balloons. The set includes twenty all-black balloons and comes with a special white chalk pen you can use to draw all over the surface.

posts.title: Pivoting Surge Protector
posts.content: Power your appliances with this genius flexible surge protector that can pivot and bend into circular and zig zag shapes so that those bulky power adapters don’t take up two outlets. Perfect for the home or office, this snake-like surge protector is a must have tool.

posts.title: Collapsible Beach Wagon
posts.content: Transport all your gear while going over difficult terrain by placing it inside this collapsible beach wagon. It sports a sturdy solid frame that can hold up to a 150 pound load and comes with 4 large wheels that enhance mobility over sand and dirt.

posts.title: Facebook Like Button Oven Mitt
posts.content: Show the cook how much you ‘Like’ their edible creations by giving them a Facebook Like Button inspired oven mitt. This clever oven mitt is a great gift idea for Facebook addicts who love to cook – though a much desired ‘Dislike’ button oven mitt is still unavailable.

posts.title: Inflatable Donut Cupholder Floats
posts.content: Introducing THE ORIGINAL Beverage Boat. BigMouth Inc tubes are made of high quality, thick, durable multi-color vinyl. Great for holding cans or cups while lounging in a pool or hot tub, these drink floats are the perfect way to make friends and family members laugh.

posts.title: Zombie Family Car Stickers
posts.content: Show off your ever growing family with these shambling zombie family car stickers. Put them on your minivan and display your love for zombies and wholesale family things – or infect random vehicles with these stickers and proclaim them to be apart of your zombie army!

posts.title: Good Morning Asshole Mug
posts.content: Greet your day – and anyone else who approaches you – with a friendly gesture by sipping your cup of Joe from this “good morning asshole” mug. The crass yet comical message comes written in an elegant cursive  font and is complemented by a cute little blue bird.

posts.title: Smiley Face Sandwich Cutter
posts.content: Make lunchtime fun for the kids by animating their meals using this smiley face sandwich cutter. It’s made from food-safe BPA plastic and is ideal for adding a cheesy grin to any bread or toast without breaking apart the entire sandwich.

posts.title: Giant Cockroach Float
posts.content: Empty a crowded pool in seconds by creeping  everyone out with this giant cockroach float. It’s made from a tough vinyl that stands up to repeated use under the hot sun and comes equipped with monstrous antennae and three eerie legs on each side.

posts.title: Panda Rice Mold
posts.content: Give your Asian themed cuisine a cute and mildly racist element to it with the panda rice mold. Instead of eating boring old white rice, give it some adorable appeal by transforming it into small and tasty pandas everyone in the family will love.

posts.title: Beer Sippy Cup
posts.content: It’s about time adults got their own sippy cup. After all, an inebriated adult is just as likely to spill their drink as their 2 year old toddler. The beer sippy cup allows you to drink without spilling a single drop while the double insulated tumbler keep your hands dry and beer cold.

posts.title: Monopoly Money Tie
posts.content: This Monopoly money tie oozes swagger. A great tie to wear to important meetings, or on first dates. The Monopoly money tie conveys a certain level of sophistication that a regular striped pattern just never could; the Monopoly money tie tells the world “I’ve made it”.
